scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:User_Notifications_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($user = false) #set ($user = $core_v2_user.Accessing)
## user must be regisetered to receive notifications #if (!$user || !$core_v2_user.IsRegistered($user.Id)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
#set ($duration = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue('duration', 10)) #set ($native = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('native', true)) #set ($mode = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('mode', 'alert'))
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.userNotifications') <script type="text/javascript" src="$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($core_v2_widget.GetFileUrl("ui.js"))"></script> <script type="text/javascript"> jQuery(function(){ jQuery.telligent.evolution.widgets.userNotifications.register({ duration: ($duration * 1000), native: #if($native) true #else false #end, mode: "$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($mode)" }) }); </script> #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="duration" labelResourceName="Duration" descriptionResourceName="Duration_Description" dataType="int" defaultValue="10"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="3600" /> </property> <property id="mode" labelResourceName="Mode" descriptionResourceName="Mode_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="alert"> <propertyValue value="alert" labelResourceName="Mode_Alert" /> <propertyValue value="banner" labelResourceName="Mode_Banner" /> </property> <property id="native" labelResourceName="Native" descriptionResourceName="Native_Description" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays user notifications as alerts or banners
When available, attempt to display desktop notifications.
Notifications can render as alert popups or window banners. By default, notifications use the less intrusive alert mode.
